content: *this great afghan is simply a large granny square lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60293 skill level easy + level 3 jiffy® article #450 3 colors 11 balls total *dusty pink el paso print caffe* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers gauge rounds 1-3 of afghan = 5 in 12 5 cm work 30 rounds in pattern weave in ends to finish
